mapper.select: select roomfloor from cj_meetroom where areaid=#{areaid} AND roombuilding=#{roombuilding} GROUP BY roomfloor
select areaid ,roomareaname from cj_meetroom group by areaid
select areaid, roombuilding from cj_meetroom where areaid = #{0}
select * from cj_meetroom where areaid=#{areaid} AND roombuilding=#{roombuilding} and roomfloor =#{roomfloor}
